allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "Add vanilla SSR benchmark" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

- Adds vanilla JavaScript SSR implementations for both CloudFlare Workers and Vercel Serverless Functions
- Includes two benchmark routes: `/bench` (standard) and `/slower-bench` (heavier computation)
- No framework overhead - pure string concatenation for HTML rendering
- Uses same computational logic as Next.js benchmark (primes, fibonacci, complex data generation)

## Implementation Details

**CloudFlare Worker:**
- `/bench` - Standard benchmark
- `/slower-bench` - 5x more primes (500k), 3x more sections (150), 9x more items

**Vercel Serverless:**
- `/api/bench` - Standard benchmark
- `/api/slower-bench` - Same heavy computation with 30s timeout

## Test Plan

- [ ] Deploy CloudFlare worker and verify `/bench` endpoint works
- [ ] Deploy CloudFlare worker and verify `/slower-bench` endpoint works
- [ ] Deploy Vercel function and verify `/api/bench` endpoint works
- [ ] Deploy Vercel function and verify `/api/slower-bench` endpoint works
- [ ] Run benchmark comparison between vanilla and Next.js implementations

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")
